children.value: Secret phrases are passwords told to Sir Victory Daruma inside the shrine for various rewards.
They can be used to obtain powerful equipment like Homing Blade as early as your 2nd adventure,
but doing so breaks the balance of the main story dungeons, so it's not recommended.
All items obtainable through secret phrases can be obtained through regular gameplay,
but some items can't be found until you gain access to post-game dungeons.
Secret phrases have the following restrictions:
Each secret phrase can only be used once per save file.
Only one secret phrase can be used per adventure.
(So you can't use another one until you either collapse or clear a dungeon).

Weapon EN JP Grass EN JP
Pickaxe KAMBE ヨキタモ Otogiriso SECRET ノザノサ
Club+3 KIRARA コルヤギ Angel Seed KAMINA アトノセ
Mallet MURADO タエチメ Talk Seed MURRAY おたべは
Homing Blade RELIX てよだぼ Revival Grass CLOVER ヨワハゼ
Dried Bonito+3 TORNEKO ルコウス Herb PHRASE マジナイ
Fish Spear RUTO パカリツ Scroll EN JP
Razor Wind+3 POE ほんうじ Lightning Scroll DORAS しでもろ
Nagamaki+3 SHIREN こぷやほ Earth Scroll HARPU ネリグキ
Spear TINA ヌヌセラ Heaven Scroll KWEH ぬべりか
Katana+3 SENSEI みぬれふ Heaven Scroll ALYNNE ゆめだい
Kabura's Blade SHARK るおへぎ Blank Scroll NEMURI ムビルプ
Shield EN JP Staff EN JP
Leather Shield+3 KOPPA どでとぴ Balance Staff [10] MOMO どなそぐ
Holy Shield SATORI ドピセモ Pot EN JP
Tribal Shield+3 MAJORA んたぬれ Synthesis Pot [6] GAIBARA ざくぬに
Scale Shield MATO ヌスネア Castle Material EN JP
Counter Shield+3 KORBEN ぎぼびわ Perfect Rock KRON しみれれ
Blast Shield+3 PANDORA ねぺなは Perfect Water ELIXIR ぱらぽき
Beetle Shield+3 HERO へめなの Perfect Wood MAMO モダテプ
Heavy Shield WRIGHT ゾテソボ Perfect Iron Sand ORYU はめんみ
Fuuma Shield OZIDUAL ユムクス Perfect Soil DOSHIN びおんわ
Bracelet EN JP Other EN JP
Pierce Bracelet ICHIRO リヒピシ 10,000 Gitan GITAN ダシシヨ
Scout Bracelet ENDAR ベゲトザ 30,000 Gitan TAO ガミメノ
No Hunger Bracelet KUFUKU セダベタ 50,000 Gitan SANJU つこめの
Bullseye Bracelet MAYHEW メペング Status Up EN JP
Projectile EN JP Level +3 DOJO そあぞけ
10 Critical Arrows MINAMO ゴムニブ Level +10 ZENKAI パゾエバ
20 Porky Stones HEIJI ウロクロ Max HP +10 REEVA ゾザロラ
10 Cannonballs KICHIZO ジソデブ Max HP +20 JAGUAR よえさぬ
99 Vouchers DENDEN ごあはも Max Strength +5 ASUKA べのぜざ
Food EN JP Max Strength +10 KENZAN プタプク
Large Onigiri PEKEJI ほにがけ Max Fullness +10% BUFU まはむえ
Special Onigiri KOYORI ゼポプタ Tips EN JP
Long-lasting Bonito KAYLEE デジナケ

export const _frontmatter = {"title":"Monster Book","metaTitle":"Secret Phrases - Shiren the Wanderer 2: Oni Invasion! Wiki","metaDescription":"Secret Phrase Guide for Shiren the Wanderer 2: Oni Invasion!"}

val.rawMDXOutput:
/* @jsx mdx */ import { mdx } from '@mdx-js/react'; /* @jsxRuntime classic */ /* @jsx mdx */ export const _frontmatter = { "title": "Monster Book", "metaTitle": "Secret Phrases - Shiren the Wanderer 2: Oni Invasion! Wiki", "metaDescription": "Secret Phrase Guide for Shiren the Wanderer 2: Oni Invasion!" }; const layoutProps = { _frontmatter }; const MDXLayout = "wrapper" export default function MDXContent({ components, ...props }) { return

{`Overview`}

{`Secret phrases are passwords told to Sir Victory Daruma inside the shrine for various rewards.`}
{` They can be used to obtain powerful equipment like Homing Blade as early as your 2nd adventure,`}
{` but doing so breaks the balance of the main story dungeons, so it's not recommended.`}

{`All items obtainable through secret phrases can be obtained through regular gameplay,`}
{`but some items can't be found until you gain access to post-game dungeons.`}

{`Secret phrases have the following restrictions:`}

  • {`Each secret phrase can only be used once per save file.`}
  • {`Only one secret phrase can be used per adventure.`}
    {`(So you can't use another one until you either collapse or clear a dungeon).`}

{`Phrase List`}
